summary: Completed comprehensive testing of QualityStudio - Quality Management System. All 38 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend login, navigation, and role-based access working correctly. Fixed logout bug in Layout.jsx.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed logout bug in Layout.jsx - was removing 'user' instead of 'current_user' from localStorage
AI service uses real GPT-5.2 via Emergent LLM Key - NOT MOCKED
Authentication is client-side only (localStorage) - consider implementing backend JWT validation for production

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all pages load, navigation works, login/logout functional)

seed_data_creation: Database has production data: 3 complaints, 4 defects, 4 RCAs, 2 CAPAs, 2 process runs, 1 golden batch, 3 SOPs, 4 knowledge docs, 10 KPIs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend CRUD APIs working. AI endpoints (rca-suggestions, classify-defect, generate-capa) use real GPT-5.2. Frontend uses Vite on port 3000, backend FastAPI on port 8001. Authentication is client-side localStorage based. Quick login buttons available on login page for different roles.

backend_apis.customer_complaints_crud: PASS - list, create, get, update, delete, filter
backend_apis.defect_tickets_crud: PASS - list, create, get, update, delete

frontend_pages.role_based_navigation: PASS - different menus for admin vs inspector
